text:
Hi everyone!
Is it possible to add style options to a custom module, or can a custom module only be edited in the design manager?
i think this is the question I had a while back, and styles currently isn’t available. <@U7SL518D6> is that correct?
Correct, there is no way to change/add/remove fields from the styles tab right now
Gonna plus one this one. Would be super great to seperate content options from style options for the content editors
